input: Should I use Redis or in-memory HashMap for caching?
rationale: Distributed caching decision triggers consistency (Lamport), capacity (Erlang), and DoS (Vector) concerns

input: What should I name this service?
Is this service ready for production?
rationale: Production readiness is resilience (Taleb) with mandatory validation (Ixian)

input: Review this architecture for a payment system
rationale: Payment is critical path (Dijkstra), security-sensitive (Vector), likely distributed (Lamport)

input: Help me scaffold a new service
rationale: Scaffolding triggers architecture skill (hexagonal is a reference within it)

input: Convene the full guild on this proposal
Quick guild review of this change
Focus guild on security for this API
rationale: Security focus triggers Vector and Dijkstra

input: Design an API for user management
rationale: API design triggers design skill with naming (Karman), DX (Ace), and boundaries (Burner)

input: What's the best way to handle event-driven communication?
rationale: Event-driven is now a reference within architecture, triggers consistency (Lamport) and flow (Erlang)

input: Run chaos experiments on our service
rationale: Chaos engineering triggers operations skill with Taleb for resilience analysis

input: This function has a weird sleep(100) in it. Can we remove it?
rationale: Legacy code investigation triggers Chesterton for historical context

input: We iterate through all users and for each, query their orders
rationale: Nested iteration performance concern triggers Knuth for complexity analysis

input: K says ship it, Dijkstra says block it - what do we do?
rationale: Agent deadlock triggers Lotfi for fuzzy trade-off scoring
